short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To help employees to easily check-in and check-out from attendance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accion Check-In/Out extension will help accion employees to check-in and check-out easily from attendance within minimum clicks. Will help employees from missing the attendance. Very useful tool for employees working from home.
